mapper.select: /* board.getBoardList */ SELECT B.BOARD_ID AS 'BOARD_ID', B.TITLE AS '게시글제목', B.CONTENT AS '게시글 내용', B.CREATED_AT AS '게시일', M.USERID AS '작성자', C.CHANNEL_TITLE AS '채널 타이틀' FROM BOARD B /* 게시글 */ LEFT JOIN GLICO.MEMBER M ON M.ID = B.AUTHOR LEFT JOIN GLICO.CHANNEL C ON C.CHANNEL_ID = B.CHANNEL
